Reasons to fall more in love with Paris

Is your income strategy taking too much risk?
 
 
Now might be the time to dial down. BlackRock’s Multi-Asset Income Fund manager Michael Fredericks advises to diversify and de-risk when reaching for income.
 
 
 
 
BlackRock’s Multi-Asset Income Fund lead portfolio manager Michael Fredericks advises to diversify and de-risk when reaching for income.
 
 
Still Room To Go >
This has been an extended cycle, but cycles don’t die of old age. We believe there’s still room to run, but the time to indiscriminately take on a lot of risk has passed.
 
The Search For Income >
Traditional stock and bond valuations appear fairly expensive: the repricing we saw in other areas of the market in 2015 has created new pockets of opportunity.

Minimum initial investment for Institutional shares is $2 million. Institutional shares also are available to clients of registered investment advisors with $250,000 invested in the fund, and offered to participants in various wrap fee programs and other sponsored arrangements at various minimums.

Investing involves risk, including possible loss of principal. Please ask your clients to consider the investment objectives, risks, charges and expenses of the fund carefully before investing.
